bio.intro: Hi! I'm Ammar Hussain Ahmed, a Frontend Developer & IT Support Specialist (First Class Honors, Umm Al-Qura University, GPA 3.8/4). I’m passionate about creating high-quality, interactive user experiences with React.js and Next.js, and writing clean, maintainable code in collaborative environments.
bio.experience: I have experience as a Technical Support Specialist at Qatarat App, a backend intern at iDara.NET, and in data entry operations. My skills include frontend technologies (JavaScript, React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS) and backend systems (Node.js, PHP, MySQL). I’m always eager to apply my skills to new challenges and keep growing technically.
bio.conclusion: I’m proud to be the Second Winner of the Smart Makkah Hackathon and always open to learning new technologies. I bring strong communication, problem-solving skills, flexibility, and the ability to work under pressure. Let’s connect to see how my technical expertise and collaborative approach can lead to success.

education.title: Education
education.description: Specialized in software engineering and web development, with a focus on modern technologies and best practices.
